About the Company: Hindustan Media Ventures Ltd is one of the leading print media companies in India in terms of readership. They publish and print Hindustan, the third largest daily newspaper in India in terms of readership.They also publish two Hindi magazines, Nandan, a childrens magazine, and Kadambini, a general interest magazine. In addition to their Hindi print publications, they also operate the website, www.livehindustan.com, which focuses on providing news in Hindi with regional content. Further, they have also recently forayed into event management and customized event solutions.
